indications.text: sodium sulfacetamide 10 % sulfur 2 % cream indicated topical control acne vulgaris , acne rosacea seborrheic dermatitis .

contraindications.text: cleanse skin thoroughly application . apply thin layer affected areas 1-3 times daily directed physician . minimize potential dryness , start one application daily , gradually increase 2-3 times daily needed directed physician .

warningsAndPrecautions: sodium sulfacetamide 10 % sulfur 2 % cream available 2 oz ( 57 g ) bottles , ndc 42192-150-02 .
adverseReactions: sodium sulfacetamide 10 % sulfur 2 % cream contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity sulfonamides , sulfur component preparation . sodium sulfacetamide 10 % sulfur 2 % cream used patients kidney disease .
name: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10 Sulfur 2 cream
indications_original: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is indicated in the topical control of acne vulgaris, acne rosacea and seborrheic dermatitis.
contraindications_original: Cleanse skin thoroughly before application. Apply a thin layer to affected areas 1-3 times daily or as directed by a physician. To minimize potential dryness, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to 2-3 times daily as needed or as directed by a physician.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is available in 2 oz (57 g) bottles, NDC 42192-150-02.
adverseReactions_original: Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is contraindicated for use by patients having known hypersensitivity to sulfonamides, sulfur or any other component of this preparation. Sodium Sulfacetamide 10% Sulfur 2% Cream is not to be used by patients with kidney disease.
